definition: Isfahan or Eşfahān, province and city in central Iran
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Today Isfahan is Iran's second biggest city.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯法罕是当今伊朗的第二大城。

sentences.english: And the worry is it is not just Isfahan.
sentences.chinese: 令人担忧的是这并不单单只发生在伊斯法罕。

sentences.english: An enamelled copperware artist at work in Esfahan.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯法罕的艺术家在制作瓷漆铜制品。

sentences.english: Then there is Isfahan's controversial metro construction.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，还有伊斯法罕被受争议的地铁工程。

definition: Tabriz city in northwest Iran, capital of Iranian East Azerbaijan
